snippet: The U.S. government now has more than $1 billion available to fight the spread of Ebola from West Africa and is proceeding with plans to deploy up to 4,000 military personnel to the region by late October....

headline.print_headline: Factbox-U.S. Funds to Fight Ebola Now Top $1 Billion, May Rise
headline.main: Factbox-U.S. Funds to Fight Ebola Now Top $1 Billion, May Rise

lead_paragraph: The U.S. government now has more than $1 billion available to fight the spread of Ebola from West Africa and is proceeding with plans to deploy up to 4,000 military personnel to the region by late October.
